text: The 1957–58 Honduran Amateur League was the tenth edition of the Honduran Amateur League. Club Deportivo Olimpia obtained its 1st national title. The season ran from 17 February 1957 to 16 February 1958.DiarioMas.hn – Los 37 títulos de liga del Olimpia en base a ley – 12 July 2016 ==Regional champions== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Regional championship !! Champions |- | Atlántida / Colón || Vida |- | Cortés || Hibueras |- | Francisco Morazán || Olimpia |- | Yoro || Honduras |} ===Known results=== ==National championship round== Played in a double round-robin format between the regional champions. Also known as the Cuadrangular.DiarioMas.hn – Olimpia vs Motagua en los campeonatos olvidados de 1947 a 1964 – 22 August 2016 ===Known results=== ==Olimpia's lineup== ==References== Category:Liga Amateur de Honduras seasons Honduras Category:1957 in Honduras Category:1958 in Honduras
title: 1957–58 Honduran Amateur League
